title: Fear By Year: The Dead Walktober (audiopinions.org Podcast)
description:
For the month of October 2013, audiopinions.org reviewed a different zombie movie every day. The series begins with a 1984 film, and moves forward one year at a time, ending at 2013. That's 31 years covered with 31 movies, over the span of 31 days.

List of movies covered:

1983 - One Dark Night 
1984 - Night of The Comet 
1985 - Re-Animator 7/10
1986 - Night of The Creeps 
1987 - The Video Dead 
1988 - Return of The Living Dead 2 
1989 - The Dead Next Door 
1990 - Bride of Re-Animator 
1991 - The Bone Yard 
1992 - Braindead 
1993 - Return of The Living Dead 3 
1994 - Cemetery Man
1995 - Voodoo 
1996 - Uncle Sam 
1997 - The Necro Files 
1998 - Biozombie 
1999 - I, Zombie: The Chronicles of Pain 
2000 - Wild Zero 
2001 - When good Ghouls Go Bad 
2002 - Curse of The 49er 
2003 - Beyond Re-Animator 
2004 - Dead and Breakfast 
2005 - The Roost
2006 - Fido 
2007 - The Mad
2008 - Pontypool
2009 - Grace 
2010 - Devil's Playground 
2011 - Deadheads 
2012 - Detention of The Dead 
2013 - Battle of The Damned
